characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings, Words of Radiance,  Oathbringer, Rhythm of War

characterDescription:
Gavilar Kholin was the King of Alethkar who united the ten Alethi princedoms. He was assassinated by Szeth in 1167, which led his son, Elhokar, to declare the War of Reckoning on the Parshendi.
He was an accomplished warrior and a full Shardbearer, possessing both a Shardblade and set of Shardplate.
